idea: We Neural Secure services private limited, which is promoted by technocrats, bringing in more than a decade of experience in various disciplines in Turnkey Projects, with an aim to provide IBMS, integrated solutions, including IT consultancy, Electronic Security Solutions, Testing & Commissioning in establishing niche facilities meeting the customer time and quality standards.
name: NEURAL SECURE SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We Are A Manufacturing Company Which Provides Fast Delivery With Cost-Effective Machinery Products.
name: Den Scoth Engineering Pvt. Ltd.

idea:
Alvino Infra Projects Private Limited is engaged in EPC projects, Hi-tech infrastructure projects and providing expertise in the fields of Solar Power and IPP Solutions. It was incorporated in August 2019 and since has scaled its operations to reach the milestone from 1.6 crores in 6 months of FY 2019-2020 year to more than Rs 5.5 crore turnover in FY 2020-21 and with the estimated target of more than Rs25 crores for FY 2021-22. Further, the Company through its technology driven services target to reach turnover of Rs. 100 crore by FY 2025-26 with more than 500 employees working for the growth of the Company. The Company has vision to be a pioneer in creating sustainable infrastructure for the country and also aims to create wealth for all the stakeholders with increased profitability through assistance of technology and innovation. 


 


The Company has been instrumental in the techno-economic feasibility study of the project on development of solar roads and has been actively engaged in making the development of solar roads in India a reality.


 


The Company is a registered MSME and has scaled through its life cycle starting with 2 employees to having more than 35 employees in less than 2 years. The Company has successfully implemented and completed two projects including undertaking entire civil aspect of 220KV GIS substation at Jawaharlal Nehru Port Trust, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra. The Company has also successfully bagged Civil and MEP projects of more than Rs. 20 crores for Indian Railways' dedicated freight corridor DFCC and BMRCL's Bengaluru Metro project respectively. 


 


The Company has been working on developing a technology driven infrastructure project management process which controls the lifecycle of a project right from receiving order to supply chain management to resources deployment to progress monitoring in a seamless and swift manner which results into delivering service in a timely and efficient manner.
name: ALVINO INFRA PROJECTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Turbonet deals in a wide range of POS Terminal,Receipt Printers,Barcode Printers,Barcode Scanners,Cash Drawers, Hand Held Terminals,Servers,Desktop, Laptop, Networking and CCTV Surveillance product

Turbonet provides best in class solutions and products for POS, AIDC and IT Infrastructure. We have designed and deployed solutions for Retail, Hospitality, Warehouse, Healthcare and more.
name: TURBONET SYSTEMS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Also sign is the biggest dedicated manufacturing unit with a production space of more than 5,00,000 sq. feet, for writing boards and display systems in India. Since the inception of the company, our sales in the local, as well as an export market, has increased many times over. Our success has been due to strict quality control, good packaging, and our marketing network.

We always strive to give our buyers something new with the best world-class quality. We are proud to introduce the latest patented products to keep you tuned with the International scenario in this millennium. We always endeavor to give you not only the products but also the best solution to meet your real demand.

In addition to our regular products in the Gen-ex series, we have introduced the Braintree series of up-down writing Boards and Sliding Boards and the Glassy-Bo series of magnetic and non-magnetic glass writing & projection boards.

As a concern for education, we have introduced sturdy and economical desks & benches in the Sit & Study range.

We have a large distribution network and sales team which ensure each customer order will be sold off. We have various types of products which will capture all most market requirements.

In the entire PAN India, we are one who makes Vertical movable boards that can be operated manually as well as remote operated. This is our one of large selling product and popular product which helps us to capture the market.
name: ALKOSIGN PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Just Deliveries(JD) is an intra-city logistics service focused on perishables. By helping brands of perishable goods replenish stock at outlets more frequently and cost-effectively, JD has the potential to impact the dynamics of the fresh foods and frozen foods industry.

Our clients include cloud kitchens and restaurant chains, B2B suppliers, Frozen, dairy & bakery companies.

Our shared fresh food distribution network enables milk runs thereby reducing food wastage and increasing sales.
name: GROWTH LOGISTICS PRIVATE lIMITED

idea:
SJAB Digital is a customer oriented company offering Blockchain development, Smart Contracts, Ecommerce Applications, Open Source ERPs, Web Development, Mobile applications, Offshore Outsource Services in various technologies.

We at SJAB Digital are also steps up for providing Web Hosting, Digital Marketing, Organic SEO, Ads on Google, Facebook, LinkedIn and Various other Social Media sites.

We are expert in developing new applications, enabling your existing applications for the web, migrating from legacy applications, optimizing and customizing your existing applications and more. We have learnt to build a superior website that is eye-catching, innovative and usable. In order to promote your business, you need the best exposure and organic traffic that you can get. For this reason, we will also provide search engine optimization services, which will help you to generate leads, improve recognition and boost your sales.
name: SJAB DIGITAL SOLUTIONS LLP

idea: As an Consulting firm, Steadfast IT helps solve data-related business challenges, with expertise in Consulting & IT services matters. As data grow in size and complexity, we help organizations better govern, secure, find, analyze and rapidly make sense of information. Innovative technology, expert services and tenacious problem solving provide our global clients with defensible and repeatable solutions. Organizations rely on us to maintain regulatory compliance, reduce legal and IT costs, protect sensitive materials, quickly find facts and harness organizational data to create business value.
name: STEADFAST IT CONSULTING PRIVATE LIMITED
